long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimal Chrome Extension clock inspired by QlockTwo.

This extension replaces your "New Tab" screen with a colourful screen that changes with every tab to tell you the time. Instead of using numbers, group of letters are organized in a way that you will be reading the time from a unique representation, thanks to the designers at QlockTwo.

This extension is inspired by the QlockTwo.
http://www.qlocktwo.com/
